text: 2003-2008 to “clear the real estate”, allowing the humans of Earth to survive just long enough to be used to access Earth’s Star Gate opening codes, at which time all, including the “Chosen Ones” would be destroyed. On behalf of humanity, the Founders, the GA, the Maharaji “blue humans” of Sirius B, the Sirian Coun- cil, the Lyran High Council and the many billions of Emerald Covenant races in our 15-Dimensional Time Matrix told the UIR to “stick their ultima- tum where the sun doesn’t shine” and refused to withdraw support of Earth’s populations. Promptly, and as expected, the UIR issued an Official Edict of War against the Founders and Emerald Covenant legions. 250
